title: Joomla!
description: Joomla! is a versatile open-source content management system known for its vibrant brand colors: a vivid red (#F44321), a cool blue (#5091CD), a warm orange (#F9A541), and a fresh green (#7AC143). These colors, which represent the brand's dynamic and collaborative nature, are documented on the Joomla! official website and can be reviewed in their branding guidelines.
